title: SSSS.Dynazenon
synopsis: One day after school, first-year high school student Yomogi Asanaka comes across a starving man under a bridge. Introducing himself as Gauma, the strange drifter informs Yomogi that he is a "kaiju user," a person who deals with the "kaiju"â€”monsters who bring harm to the city and its citizens.
